projects.title: Gen-AI/LLM Content Tagging System
projects.summary: Designed and implemented a human-in-the-loop Gen-AI/LLM content tagging system to enable personalized learning features.
projects.description_long: Designed and implemented a human-in-the-loop Gen-AI/LLM content tagging system, enabling personalized learning features that increased user retention and engagement by ten percent, while boosting user satisfaction.

projects.title: Content-Based Filtering Recommendation System
projects.summary: Led the development and deployment of a content-based filtering recommendation system served via FastAPI.
projects.description_long: Led development and deployment of a content-based filtering recommendation system available via FastAPI endpoint, increasing user enrollments by six percent, and improving user satisfaction and SEO performance.

projects.title: Knowledge Graph Database
projects.summary: Collaborated with product teams to build a POC knowledge graph database using AWS Neptune.
impact: Created a POC knowledge graph database in AWS Neptune
Paved the way for a new learner experience architecture
projects.description_long: In collaboration with the product team, created a POC knowledge graph database in AWS Neptune, paving the way for a new learner experience through an alternative architecture.

projects.title: Scenario Analysis & Revenue Forecasting
projects.summary: Served as decision science lead conducting scenario analysis and revenue forecasting for executive strategic planning.
impact: Aided executive leadership in strategic planning via modeling results
projects.description_long: Conducted scenario/sensitivity analysis and revenue forecast modeling as decision science lead and presented results to executive leadership to aid in strategic planning.

projects.title: A/B Test Experimentation & Causal Inference
projects.summary: Supervised product-wide A/B testing experimentation and performed causal inference for non-experimental data.
impact: Supervised rapid A/B test experimentation across various product teams
Provided causal inference analysis in the absence of experiments
projects.description_long: Supervised and supported rapid A/B test experimentation across various product teams and provided pre/post analysis and causal inference in the absence of experiments.

projects.title: Predictive ML Models
projects.summary: Shipped and maintained predictive machine learning models including LTV and churn prediction in AWS SageMaker.
impact: Shipped and maintained LTV, churn, retention, and engagement models
projects.description_long: Worked with fellow data scientists in the shipment and maintaining of various predictive machine learning models in AWS SageMaker, including LTV, churn and retention, and learner engagement models.

projects.title: Monte Carlo Revenue Simulation
projects.summary: Developed Monte Carlo simulations to analyze revenue impact across different user segments.
impact: Identified user segments with outsized revenue impact to inform investment strategy
projects.description_long: Developed Monte Carlo simulations to identify user segments with outsized effects on revenue, thereby informing leadership on key areas of investment.

projects.title: Analytics Pipeline Support
projects.summary: Maintained and supported data analytics pipelines using a modern data stack.
impact: Provided continued support for enterprise analytics pipelines
projects.description_long: Broad and continued support of analytics pipelines using Snowflake, dbt, and Looker.

projects.title: KPI Monitoring & Forecasting Dashboards
projects.summary: Developed and deployed end-to-end KPI monitoring and forecasting dashboards for client use.
impact: Deployed KPI monitoring and forecasting dashboards for multiple clients
projects.description_long: End-to-end development and deployment of KPI monitoring and forecasting dashboards for various clients.

projects.title: Data Architecture & Analytics Advisement
projects.summary: Advised clients on data architecture and the implementation of advanced analytics processes.
impact: Provided strategic advisement on architecture and analytics processes
projects.description_long: Provided strategic advisement of data architecture and advanced analytics processes.

projects.title: Network Graph Analysis
projects.summary: Created network graphs from routing data to optimize system design and reduce patient wait times.
impact: Mitigated bottlenecks to improve patient wait time and satisfaction
projects.description_long: Created a network graph from disparate routing data to assess and improve system design, effectively mitigating bottlenecks to improve patient wait time and satisfaction.

projects.title: Healthcare Data Model Migration
projects.summary: Designed and refactored healthcare data models during migration to Snowflake.
impact: Migrated healthcare data models from MS SQL Server to Snowflake
projects.description_long: Contributed to healthcare data model design, refactoring, and migration from MS SQL Server to Snowflake.
